other_tests.findings: The appendix is dilated measuring up to 1.4 cm and fluid filled, with surrounding inflammatory change. An appendicolith is seen lodged within the base. There is a 1.6 x 1.6 x 2.0-cm nodule within the medial limb of the right adrenal gland, which is new.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The hypodensity in the anterior portion of segment 4a/b is unchanged from a prior date.
